name: FreePrint
description: FreePrint takes the form of a free desktop 3D printer capable of printing plastic objects. Since many parts of FreePrint are made from plastic and FreePrint prints those parts, FreePrint self-replicates by making a kit of itself - a kit that anyone can assemble given time and materials. It also means that - if you've got a FreePrint - you can print lots of useful stuff, and you can print another FreePrint for a friend!

files.name: Assembly Instructions
files.description: Collection of instructions for assembling the machine

files.name: Main Board
files.description: Main controller board for driving the stepper motors

files.name: Stepper motor Drivers
files.description: Control Drivers to allow the main board to communicate with the smart stepper motors

files.name: Main Board Firmware
files.description: Primary control software for flashing the main board
